text: Kamaghɨn, me Israelian ara tuavir ghua gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn zuimɨn ghue. Me aramin tuaviba puvatɨ. Me ghua Israelian adarazi batifi. Ezɨ Israelian mɨdorozir gumazir okoruar pumuning iza Benjaminɨn anabamɨn adarazi batogha bar me mɨsoagharɨghizɨ me ariaghire.20:42 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
